phyz@home
distributed quantum gravity
SEE = (1/4 GN) × Acut
GN = — (lattice units)
1A Regge lattice (triangulated 4-sphere) defines discrete spacetime.
2Your browser solves an SU(2) gauge field eigenvalue problem on it.
3The lattice is bisected; entropy SEE and cut area Acut are measured.
4If SEE ∝ Acut, the slope yields Newton’s constant GN.
